# Discussion Guidelines

Welcome to ProjectHub-MCP discussions! This is the place to:

## ğŸ’¬ General Discussion Topics

- **General Questions**: Ask about how to use ProjectHub-MCP
- **Ideas**: Share your ideas for new features
- **Show and Tell**: Share what you've built with ProjectHub-MCP
- **Help**: Get help from the community
- **Announcements**: Stay updated with project news

## ğŸ“‹ Discussion Categories

## ğŸ“ Before Starting a Discussion

1. **Search existing discussions** to see if your topic has been covered
2. **Check the documentation** in our [wiki](https://github.com/anubissbe/ProjectHub-Mcp/wiki)
3. **Choose the right category** for your discussion
4. **Use descriptive titles** that clearly explain your topic
5. **Provide context** to help others understand your question or idea

## ğŸ¤ Community Guidelines

- Be respectful and inclusive
- Stay on topic
- Help others when you can
- Follow our [Code of Conduct](CODE_OF_CONDUCT.md)

## ğŸ› Found a Bug?

Please use the [issue tracker](https://github.com/anubissbe/ProjectHub-Mcp/issues/new/choose) instead of discussions for bug reports.

## ğŸš€ Feature Requests

For specific feature requests, consider using our [feature request template](https://github.com/anubissbe/ProjectHub-Mcp/issues/new?template=feature_request.yml).
